title: Symlog Demo
description: Matplotlib is a data visualization library that is widely used in Python. It allows users to create a wide variety of visualizations, including line plots, scatter plots, bar charts, and more. In this lab, you will learn how to use the `symlog` axis scaling in Matplotlib to create symmetric log plots.
